::Stratus::

The humm of the Decepticon base woke Stratus up, and he ran off toward
the specified location. Entering, he sees Slaughter, and fires an
organic pod at him after jumping back. The pod hits the ground,
releasing vines that try wrap around slaughter.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> The computer inside the Decepticon base initiated all standard
defense
> procedures. "Attention, all available Decepticons. Two unidentified
> signatures are on board. Head to the second floor (where Squawktalk
is) or
> to main computer room" it hummed. Every where on the ship a siren
was
> sounding, and warning lights flickered.
